abstract: Contractors, property developers and other ailing construction-related stocks surged, as investors anticipated a construction boom before the 2020 Games.
snippet: Contractors, property developers and other ailing construction-related stocks surged, as investors anticipated a construction boom before the 2020 Games.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — Ever since a group of out-of-work samurai pooled their pensions to found Onoda Cement 130 years ago, the company has had its ups and downs: industrialization, a crippling war, Japan’s postwar economic miracle.

headline.main: Investors Bet on Olympic Construction Boom
